reviewText:
It is not possible to talk about Cuban Music without mentioning Chachacha; I really enjoy this great material with a very informative DVD and CD,if you like Chachacha and you want to learn about this rhythm, this is an authentic material made with passion for people who really know about,I never have seen anything so greatly done than this material, I do recommend to have it if you want to have an authentic material.

Me gustaria decirle a las personas hispanas, que este material merece la pena comprarlo y tenerlo, nunca antes habia visto algo tan instructivo y tan bien hecho; muchas veces vinculamos la politica y la ideologia a las cosas hechas en Cuba, pero este material esta hecho con pasion y por personas que conocen de este ritmo de verdad, es una verdadera joya, ojala encontraramos cosas asi mas a menudo.
